name: Zoom Hotel Mulawarman Samarinda
hotelClassAttribution: This property is classified according to Giata.
address: Jl. Mulawarman No.38 Pelabuhan, Samarinda 75242 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Good Budget Hotel. Appreciate with fast services since arrival at front office. And care about complaining. all staff are friendly and respond well to service requests.  The rooms are clean, although not too spacious but very comfortable to rest.  The view from the rooftop is really amazing, you can see the Mahakam river.
Good choice
reviews.title: Good Budget Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel located near SCP mall that strategic location. Room size around 18m2 enough for rest with your family. Cozy place with affordable price about 400k include breakfast. Breakfast menus are variatif and tasty. There is only 1 elevator available to room access. No bathtub available, only shower for take a bath. Parking area need to improved, especially for car its very limited.
reviews.title: Budget hotel

reviews.text:
Basic hotel catering basic traveler needs and room is clean except layout of bathroom is a little cramp. 
My only negative experience was that my room was at Level 5, just below their Sky Lounge, very noisy when band started playing :(, can sleep well or early.
reviews.title: Stay at Zoom Hotel

reviews.text:
By the end of May, suddenly I have to visit Samarinda for business purposes. My friend recommend me to give a try this hotel.

Finally I got the room from the Online Apps which costs around IDR 350.000,- per night including breakfast. 

I checked in around 5.00 pm and the hotel is already full which means I can not even choose my room and got at the end of aisle (corner room).

The room itself was very small, even I am alone, but I confuse how to place my luggage well.
The bathroom was normal (even I think still a bit small) compare to the other 2/3 star hotel brand.

The staffs were polite, but not giving any greeting or smile when we passed each other.
The location was very strategic, located nearby the mall (I forgot the name of the mall), which have McDonald, KFC, Starbucks, and other great brands.

The breakfast is located at the rooftop cafe with the view of Sungai (River) Mahakam which very great.
I had tried also the cafe at night and the ambience is quiet good.

The only things that make me not so comfortable is the smell.
I don't know what perfume is using by them, but the smell is not that good for me even I tried to use the Bayfresh / Stella from the hotel staff.
Perhaps this is only my personal opinion who doesn't like with their perfume inside the room.

Other service is great. 
If you are looking for hotel with that kind of budget, you can give a try this hotel.

Thanks üôè
reviews.title: Worth as the price

reviews.text:
Hotel ini terletak hanya sekitar 200 m dari Samarinda Central Plaza (mall) sehingga memudahkan untuk mencari makanan atau ke supermarket. Tapi fasilitas hotel ini sangat mengecewakan. Hotel yang terdiri dari 6 lantai ini hanya memiliki 1 lift, sehingga tamu harus menunggu cukup lama untuk naik lift. Selain itu, toilet di kamar diletakan menghadap tembok (hanya berjarak sekitar 15 cm dari tembok) - lihat foto terlampir. Untuk ukuran orang normal, saya tidak bisa duduk di toilet karena kaki saya mentok ke tembok!

Saya menginap di hotel ini selama dua malam, di hari kedua, kunci kamar saya tidak bisa digunakan untuk membuka kamar, sehingga saya harus turun lagi ke lobby untuk meminta agar kunci saya diprogram ulang, dan harus menunggu lift lagi (yang lama) untuk bisa naik ke kamar. Tempat ini not recommended!

Hope to visit this hotel again soon with fam. 
Thanks again!

reviews.text:
I stay for 6 days in room 519 from August 26, 2019 and writimg this review in lobby hotel. . I chose the horizon because of its big name and many good reviews.

Friday morning, August 30, 2019, I planned to leave the hotel for a short time. Therefore I put a prepaid e-money card in the room power slot so when I arrived I got a cool room temperature. When I enter the room around 18.30 the room power off. Well,  no problem for me. But I did not find my card anywhere in my room.

I complain to the receiptionist I did not get a good answer instead offering an additional card. It doesn't matter if my card is lost. It just a little money in the card. I just feel insecure and uncomfortable here again.

The rest of the hotel services are quite good. For food taste is enough. Maybe it needs improvement to omelete eggs because it's too plain. The hotel personel is very friendly. The room is clean. AC is cool enaugh. 

In the future if i have business trip to samarinda again I think I will not stay in this hotel anymore. 

Regards
reviews.title: I Lost My E Money Card

reviews.text: This is a reasonably situated and cheap hotel in Samarinda.  First the negatives - despite the skytop bar, on certain occasions this is shut or doesn't serve alcohol - and there's no notice as to when this might happen.  The restaurant still allows smoking which is a particular annoyance to me.  Breakfast isn't bad but the tables are set up for big groups which is odd when there's only an eight person table left and you have nowhere else to sit.  On the positive side the rooms are OK although not quite sound proofed, the next door neighbour's phone conversations were coming through loud and clear.  Beds are good.  Staff are competent and friendly.  Parking is tricky but looked after by security.  It's a good budget/business place.
reviews.title: Overall a good budget stay in Samarinda

reviews.text:

Great place to stay in Samarinda, the hotel is well situated around the happening places of the town. The river view of Mahakam river from my room was amazing. 

This hotel has a lovely restaurant called Silver Sea, food is delicious having good variety of cuisine. 

Ms. Helda and team is amazing with full of energy and they are always willing to go the extra mile to make you comfortable.

Great work Ms. Helda, keep it up !

reviews.text: when I booked this hotel for vacation 2 days only. even I live in Samarinda too. This hotel is very strategic location close to the city center, access to everywhere else easy. The Clean room, nice decorated of minimalis, feeling cozy and have a good wifi in room. I think the price per-night is affordable. Its great to stay here. The staff serving with friendly and have a great service. Get your experince for stay here.
reviews.title: Great stay and Clean Room

reviews.text:
I stayed there more than once, almost once a week this month.

Room service is good with sufficient amount of food options from the restaurant.

Bathroom is clean and they even gone the extra mile by recently providing organic-based tooth paste. The soap and shampoo solutions are mounted on the wall near the shower, and at the sink you have to extend your arm to reach, but it is much easier than having to deal with only one small soap near the sink.

Breakfast is neat for a local, but not many options for a foreigner. However, a staff is available always to prepare omelet. Also they have some jam and toast. In addition, there is hot and cold water, tea, coffee and creamer, which sums up my breakfast there.

Best of all the reception staff; very helpful. It is almost one of few hotels that does the paper work for you and when I came the following time they recognized me directly and I was in the room within few minutes. They also care to help with any thing you ask.

The  room is quite standard and is surprisingly quiet. I really enjoyed sleeping there. The bed is comfy, but nothing fancy. The room not having a mini fridge is a setback, but not a deal breaker. There is a sufficiently sized desk and a wall mounted LCD TV.
reviews.title: Good Sleep, Great Service

reviews.text: I stay 3 night  at this hotel for business. Clean room, cozy bathroom. But too little bathroom. I like a bed a my room, very comfortable. Good staff. A price is good for business leisure. Location in center of samarinda.
reviews.title: Comfortable bed

reviews.text:
I have never been stayed in Samarinda even though its my 4th trip there, i've always been stay in Balikpapan. When i heard about Amaris opening there, ok lah lets give it a try.

For location, i think its not very central, its hard to find food around. Service is ok, i think all the staff willing to give their best. Room is a basic "kost kostan" type, they give very poor amenities and room size is small, even smaller than my studio apartement in Jakarta, but i think its normal for an express hotel, but compare with the price its not normal.

Breakfast, there nothing fancy about it, just enough for energize my morning. Bottom line, if I get lower rate maybe i will consider to stay again but not for IDR 400k or more.
reviews.title: Basic, nothing fancy.

reviews.text:
Another business trip to Samarinda. Came the day after Indonesia's Independence Day Celebration and our usual hotels, the Aston Samarinda & Swiss-Bel Hotel were booked by local dignitaries who had come in to mark the celebration and was quite packed. Was lazy to move hotel and got our folks to book us here during the whole duration we were here

Pros :
(1) Rooms Were Clean
This is my most basic and important requirement. Refer to attached photo for shots of the room.

(2) New Property
The hotel had just opened in June. So everything was new.

(3) Very Reasonable Room Rates
So the rates here were very reasonable , IDR400,000 before tax or just above SGD$40 / USD$35. More than half the price of the Aston or Swiss-Bel. But bear in mind these two are more upmarket properties. More on this later

(4) Fastest Wi-Fi Thus Far in Samarinda Hotels
Of all the 5 hotels I have stayed in Samarinda, this place has the fastest Wi-Fi so far. Even faster and more stable than the more pricey and upmarket Aston or Swiss-Bel. Wi-Fi is complimentary and you can sign in multiple devices. 

Cons :
(1) The toilet is small
The toilet is small and can prove to be challenging to move around inside. A bit of an inconvenience. Refer to attached photos

(2) Rather Limited Breakfast Buffet Selection
The breakfast spread is rather limited. There isn't a dedicated restaurant exactly, but is served in the space in front of the front desk at the lobby. The spread is limited to about half a dozen local items and some breads and an egg station. Not a big deal if you do not mind local food.

Points of Contention / Debatable :
(1) Location
Technically the hotel is in the geographical centre of the city. However many business are located nearer the bank of the River Mahakam. Not much of a hassle if you have a driver at your disposal, which was the case for me. Also unlike Aston or Swiss-Bel which is located right next to Samarinda Central Plaza (SCP), the largest mall currently in Samarinda. The nearest mall if you need one is Mall Lembuswana which is a short 5-minutes stroll from the hotel. So it depends your purpose here. Refer to photo titled "Map of Area", it is a cute area map by the hotel at the lobby.

(2) This is Not an Up Market Property but a Basic Business Hotel
So basically most of the guest here while I stayed and from what I hear from my local partners are here for business. The property is not an up market one versus the Aston and Swiss-Bel. It does not pretend to be and if you need the frills of a pool, gym, hotel bar/longue, extensive room service menu, and so forth. This might not be the place for you

Conclusion :
The rooms are clean and I am here on business always and hardly in the room much beyond it being a place to sleep at night. Seldom use any of the amenities at any other property anyway. Hence just based on the rates and fast Wi-Fi alone, I would not mind staying here again. But if you do need the frills, this might not be the place for you
reviews.title: Economical and Pleasantly Good Choice

reviews.text: Purely a business class hotel. Rooms are clean. Wifi facility is good. Need to have laundry facility. Need to increase some room facility. The variety in Breakfast is very minimum. Overall a good experience.

reviews.text: In the busy city of Samarinda this hotel just started this July. Friendly staff, not everybody is fluent in English, but the friendly manager is interested and he speaks English. Good breakfast buffet, nice clean rooms. No alcohol, so we went to the Aston Hotel to have a beer. We made a very interesting boattrip (no guide) to Muara Muntai and Macong, using the information in our guidebook. The capacity from desk to provide tourist information is limited.
reviews.title: A new, modern nice hotel

reviews.text: Stayed at Amaris Samarinda during their opening week.  We've been to 2 or 3 other Amaris hotels in Jakarta, and this one is easily the nicest looking one.  Bright, spacious with a pleasing modern look.  The room was clean and comfortable, the bedding was plush, the aircon was cold, and the hot shower was decent.  Wifi signal in the room was strong and the connection speed was surprisingly not too bad.  Breakfast was the standard, simple Amaris fare.  The location is pretty central, near two major malls.  Parking spots were plentiful.  All in all, good value for money.
reviews.title: Bright, spacious and good value for money

reviews.text: Lokasi hotel sangat menarik berada di tengah pusat kota Samarinda, dekat dengan mall, dan dilalui semua jurusan angkot mapun taxi online sangat mudah diakses. Fasilitas lumayan lengkap dan bagus, hanya kondisi pintu kamar yang sepertinya sudah tua perlu diperbaharui kembali.

reviews.text:
First of all I wanted to thank Mr. Oniel, the receptionist guy whose superfriendly, to served me a quick check in without waiting, in a high floor non smoking doublebed room as I wish. After a long exhausting trip all you need is a quick release in a hot shower and comfy bed. Thank you!

It's quite hard to find good hotel in Samarinda. Most of them are old bnb, and the others are way too costly for its class. Lucky me to finally found Midtown Hotel and really satisfied with it. Location is great, right in the heart of Samarinda, the enter point is easy to access. Get hungry? Foodcourts are around.. pick as you wish. There's also affordable spa next to the building if you think hotel spa is too fancy.

Cleanliness seems to be their motto, the corridor and the room are fragrant, no dust or stain. Breakfast also delicious, wide variation, and they provide Samarinda signature dish like Nasi Kuning with Haruan Bumbu Habang, and Gangan Patin. Their table service is a four stars standard. I've never been served like that in another three stars hotel. Will come again no doubt on my next visit.
reviews.title: One of The Best Hotel in Samarinda

reviews.text:
3 stars hotel that provides luxurious services in room and restaurant.

the room was clean, bathroom was also clean and well maintained.

The breakfast menu gives many alternative foods and i was really enjoy the traditional drinks jamu (beras kencur especially), traditional snacks, and many kind of breads. 

the hotel is located near the government office of Kalimantan Timur province. It tooks only 10-15 minutes to reach them.

Hotel was also surrounded by many restaurants and many famous hangout places.

The fitness is also nice and provides many kind of tools. I enjoyed well the treadmill and static bike. Swimming pool is also a good choice to keep healthy during stay at the hotel 

Midtown hotel is absolutely a bargain choice hotel  in Samarinda.

reviews.text: This hotel is the first among the Senyiur Hotels lineup. Right off the bat, this hotel once was one of the top hotel, and somehow it still is. The glory of old days is written all over this hotel. The lobby, is really spacious, the furniture is all wood, and I mean, real strong, hard wood. The room service was great. One of the room service was so friendly, he talk about the hotel's history, apparently owned by a muslim Chinese. No SARA intended, it just a very interesting story that I put that in this review. I forget the name of the staff, if I remember, I'll edit this review. The room was good, clean, bathroom is good, with the decent separation from the bathtub. The bathtub though, it felt like it needs to be replaced. There is a hollow underneath, or maybe just fix that. The only downside is the receptionist, less friendly, and it took forever just to check-in. But the check-out process, was lighting fast.

reviews.title: Nostalgic Hotel

reviews.text:
Bumi Senyiur, welknown hotel on Samarinda, East Kalimantan. Very recommended for business or pleasure travellers.
With complete and favolous services, will make us homey, and will come again.
One single night with great services, thank you to all hotel staff and support
reviews.title: Classic and Fabolous

reviews.text:
This is my third time here. Basically almost nothing changed, and I find some issues.

The room is spacious, but some items are broken. One of the plug is not working. Me and wife locked in the bathroom. The doorknob is loosen and once you rotate it wrong direction, then you're locked. Must be open from outside.

The parking lot is wide. But when I arrive from walking around the city, the parking is full with weeding guest's car. So I have to park temporary, and at 10 PM, I was awaken by security asked me to move my car to a proper place. I was already sleeping at that time...

The restaurant is renovated, and the temporary replacement is a bit limited. It feel a bit cramped during breakfast due to crowd.

It's because the nostalgic feeling that kept me not giving lower than 3 stars rating. But it definitely need an upgrade...
reviews.title: Need an upgrade

reviews.text:
This is an old hotel, not classic but old. I got a non smoking room on the 2nd floor, and it was huge with a non central AC. Shower and toilet room was also spacious with complete basic amenities including hair dryer. The water run properly including the hot water.

Unfortunately, there were a lot of troubles with the room. I was given a username and password for login but it kept failing and when i reported it they said there was a trouble, and yet not fixed until my check out date. The AC was not even cold due to the leakage. It caused a very noisy sound in the middle of the night. There was no safe box in the room but coffee and tea, water boiler were all provided. I also disturbed by so many ants on the table. 

Moreover this hotel has a ballroom which means there might be a lot of events would be held here, meaning guest could stay here too. So, I guess a little renovation or redecoration needed to improve the quality of this hotel.
reviews.title: Maintainence Needed

reviews.text:
For a hotel that was build maybe 2-3 decades ago, I consider this is ok and as  I expected. The room was spacious with old paintings, the bathroom is also spacious and the water in the shower is strong. 

I can still consider this hotel as a 5 star hotel in terms of its service. 
Great and fast service.
reviews.title: bring back the 80s

reviews.text: This hotel looked grand from the outside, nut its the typical old hotel with its classic interiors. They had these collections of antiques cars and motorbikes around the checkin counter. The corridor was fully carpeted (its quite fluffy) so you wouldn't hear noisybfootsteps disturbing your sleep. The room was clean and spacious, bathroom was completed with an old bathtub but still working. Breakfast was good, but they have this smoking area inside the restaurant (with AC). Could do better.
reviews.title: Classic gem

reviews.text:
Arrived at night, check in process was fast, but lobby design was not resemblance of most 5 stars hotels, room was spacious but sadly this is an old hotel and it's furniture looks tired already, bed badly need replacement since you just can feel the spring, bath room is clean but again it really far from 5 star hotel standard, most new 3 stars hotel can beat that easily.

Again breakfast was far from 5 star hotel standard.
reviews.title: Old Hotel

reviews.text:
A classic hotel with interior design of the '80s, every corner of the room tastefully decorated and has a very romantic impression. Very friendly service and very tasty food dish at breakfast, provided various menus ranging from traditional, west to the common dish.

Laundry service is also very satisfying, fast and not too expensive. The memorable experience of staying in the city of Samarinda at Bumi Senyiur hotel because its position is strategically located in the middle of the business center.
reviews.title: Classic hotel with very good services

reviews.text: This hotel is a bit old. But still have quality in it. It's my second time here, and is as good as I can remember. Especially the pool with its one big slide. The location is nice, though it's better for you to have your own car.
reviews.title: Old but Gold

reviews.text:
Bumi Senyiur is still one of the best hotels in town, but felt deserted. Very quiet, only few customers and some how like old sleepy half forgotten hotel. I have been in this hotel few times over the years and this used to be a very busy bustling place. 

I like the large rooms. They must be near 50 sq.m in size. Plenty of natural wood gives warm peaceful feeling. Even everything is kept clean, the maintenance is lagging behind. Almost all fittings are loose and glue patched repairs show the quality of the maintenance which focuses on repair more than up-keeping.  

I had dinner in hotel and enjoyed tasty local food. Breakfast was ok, not gourmet but better than average in category of small town hotels in Kalimantan. 

Bumi Senyiur will not disappoint neither excite you.
reviews.title: Those were the glory days

reviews.text:
For the last five years i can say that i was a regular guest to this hotel..  And I feel obliged to write my review.

I believe it is one of the oldest hotel in Samarinda. But we can see that the maintenance is good. And they keep doing renovation in some rooms.

Honestly, sometimes i felt that the hotel is a bit gloomy inside rooms. I remember that sometimes i felt wanting more lights.

Breakfast serves with many varieties but the taste are just too average. 

One thing I love about this hotel is that the rooms are so spacious.

If i'm going to Samarinda, Bumi Senyiur is my first choice.
reviews.title: Big old hotel with very good service...

reviews.text:
stayed for 2 nights and found them
pleasing. 
The rooms are cozy and clean.. 
Although we were given a room in the smoking area, luckily the smoke did not enter our room. 

service was excellent.. breakfast was mediocre.. the chinese food was delicious (we had them at a wedding party we attended)

Easy access to stores and reataurants outside the hotel.

Overall great place and we would stay here again if we return to town..

reviews.text:
Walking distance from the Big Mall but not in the busiest area of the city. The room is much more spacious than we expected, and you can have bridge view from the hotel (not necessarily from all room, I guess, but you can see it by a window near the elevator).

There 2 bolsters (guling) on the bed + 1 small one on the sofa, which was a great addition to our experience. Not a common thing we find in hotels, even other Harris hotel we stayed at didn't have it. When you are Indonesian, you just know how importance this should be. I brought my toddler to this trip/stay, and he was happy enough with the small boolster. We had great sleep overnight. 

The water shower works verywell, which is not eady to find in this city. üëç We had to wait for the room to be ready for quite a while as our room wasn't ready, they even offered to upgrade us to the suite room so we shouldn't wait any longer, But we didn't take it because their offer was a smoking room yet we expected a non-smoking room.

It wasn't easy to extend room stay though as so many people may have booked rooms, so make sure you planed well.

The staffs were such a great support, they escorted us to the elevator when check in, and to our car when checked out. One of the person I remember was Mrs. Uli. 

(I forgot to rate in my previous submitted review, TripAdvisor ux for rating icons definitely need improvement)
reviews.title: Walking distance from the Big Mall, great view, & they provide 2+1 bolster (guling)!

reviews.text:
I stayed there for 3D 2N (29-31 August 2019) for my business trip because the event was held in the hotel.
For the first night was okay, everything smooth, the room was clean and smelled good. 
But the tragedy happened on the 2nd day evening when I back to my room after the event finished. All my belongings were gone. My toiletries, bag, clothes (hang in the wardrobe), sandals have gone WITHOUT any confirmation. 
I knew that there was a miscommunication between the committee and the hotel staff about my stay, but that's not appropriate to take all the guest's stuff without any confirmation. When all the guest's stuff still there (clothes in the wardrobe, sandals, and personal toiletries), the housekeeping staff should've thought that the guest is not yet checked out, and need to confirm with reception desk whether the guest would check out that day or not.
All my stuff were recklessly pulling in to my bag. 
That was so bad, you know!

Location: Location quite strategies. Located just next to Mall, where you can find food, stuff (like clothes & sandals & shoes in Matahari department store) and your daily needs at Hypermarket.
reviews.title: Good but need to train the housekeeping staff

reviews.text:
According to traveloka this hotel win the hotel award so we tried to stay here. This hotel was well positioning because at the city central, next to Plaza Mulia so if u need something at the mall just walk.
But, quite less people or something i dont know coz when first time get in no bellboy r anyone help us with the luggage so we have to bring it ourself get in the lobby n wait, when we checked out one bellboy or hotel staff help us. No one suggest r give us welcome drink n the reception seems busy behind the desk. Then entered the room was quite nice, clean linen but there is no doormat in front of the bathroom on the first night, they just place the doormat on the tomorrow morning after we click clean up the room button. 
Unfortunately the breakfast menu was poor. When put sushi...the rice was dry n sushi roll filled with abon not with salmon, tuna etc like sushi; a bit too salty for fried rice or noodle menu and what they called hash brown just like perkedel coz the potatoes was hard n no flavor coz its failed hash brown. 
Quite fresh salad, quite fresh juice n healthy coz no sugar added. So during our stay we didnt enjoy breakfast at all. And less communication in file coz we^ve already pay the hotel through the travel but one of my friend room with the extra bed they cancel the key coz they said we havent pay the extra bed. But quite nice n fast respon when i need the iron for my shirt
reviews.title: Strategic place but poor in breakfast

reviews.text: The hotel is good with timely service. Centrally located. This hotel is managed by Accor hotels but being a 5 star property the staff is uncomfortably confused with serious lack of English communication skills. They don't even have foreign exchange facility and payment has to be made in Rupiah only. At time of checkout I almost paid all the amount in local currency by some balance still left since I was getting late as I have flight to catch from Balikpapan airport as Samarindah doesn't have one functional till yet. I offered the balance in dollars even in other regional currency but they didn't entertained it at all in fact they very comfortably asked me to go to exchange nearby and get it exchanged which I got it done after struggling with a traffic jam and wasting my almost 2 hours in settling down the bills.
reviews.title: 5 Star without English Staff

reviews.text: Arrived late, took forever just to check in, got twin bed..asked for double bed....without even check got answered already sold out...although its low occupancy...front desk have limited english skill...probably because it was night shift...room spacious, if you got low floor...good luck with the view, you barely see anything aside of some walls of building nearby..amenities below standard for four star hotels, towel not fluffy...bed was okay, breakfast limited choices...

reviews.text: I make a 4 days seminars here and I got all so well from the service. The breakfast and lunch are so exciting delicious with varies menu. Also the bedroom and bathroom so clean. The place not so strategic, quite far from the city tour object, but thanks that this hotel has a good shopping mall so we not difficult to buy something or restaurant.

reviews.text:

reviews.text: I came to Samarinda for business purposes so i need a good quality of wifi to support my job, but in that room was provide bad wifi signal so its so distracted me, and we couldnt be flexible also coz of parking lot, so please do the change

reviews.text:
This hotel is nice. The room is spacious and clean. The food is also good. The location, connected with mall, provide you entertainment. Overall, this will be amazing hotel if not because of one thing, parking lot.

Once you fail to park in front of the hotel, get ready to spin your way up several floor. And we have to carry our luggage from parking lot at third floor, through swimming pool and restaurants and go down to lobby for check-in.

Don't forget to get your parking ticket stamped at the lobby to get free charges.

reviews.text: This was a Beautiful hotel that exceeded my expectations. Comfy spacious rooms.  Great friendly staff. Decent food. Could of spent a week there. This was one of the hotels on our 14 day Cosmos Best of italy tour.
reviews.title: It was grand!

reviews.text:
We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel Grand Victoria.  My kids felt very fancy staying at such a cool hotel.  The sweeping staircase was especially impressive.  We stayed in a room with two queens and a pull out sofa bed.  The room was very spacious, comfortable and clean.  We stayed here during the off season, so the room was a fabulous value!  The pool was small, but clean.  They ran out of towels, which was kind of an issue.  The hot tub was fabulous.  

The breakfast was really delicious: pancakes, waffles, eggs, biscuits and gravy, fruit, cereal, juice, yogurt, cottage cheese, sausages.  However, even though it was the off season, the breakfast room got incredibly crowded.  They ran out of food quickly.  The staff was doing their best to keep the tables bussed and keep the food coming.  They seemed overwhelmed though.

We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.text: Hotel need renovation as soon as possible...some of facilities need more upgrading. I love the concept of breakfast in high floor. Hotel near the small department store, but far from city center and Mahakam river.
reviews.title: Renovation is a must

reviews.text:
i booked this hotel through Traveloka with VHO Named Airyrooms Lembuswana S. parman.

When the first i arrived , i lil bit doubting about the exact location of this hotel , because i booked it as airyrooms , and it doesnt give me any clue where it is . But from searching in gmaps , i know that the hotel is Grand Victoria . Maybe, for the future, please create VHO sign in front of Hotel for make the customer easily recognized the location .

This hotel is really close to Lembuswana Mall and Universitas Mulawarman . So strategic !

When i checked in, i wait about half hour. because there's a miss communication between The Hotel with airyrooms , i should wait them till they finish their problem . Please fix this .

The hotel is great hotel when its new , now its look a lil bit old and lousy , the lobby, corridor and everything should be refreshed again.

When i entered the rooms , the rooms is spacious with old furniture , the TV is so small , like 24 inch and its not even suitable with a big room. WiFi is really slooooow ! 
plus point from the room is just the bath tube . But i have serious concern with the bathroom, the water is yellowish , i dont know if its from the source or its because the piping, please fixed thaat .

Breakfast is okay, its on the rooftop . But when the day gets rainy, the water spoiled everywhere . Hmm , it makes me felt not comfortable anymore to continue my bfast .

Overall, i like this hotel so much , the location and the service . Please fixed the problem , and i sure this hotel will be great !
reviews.title: Quite Old , Good Service

reviews.text:
I stayed here for 8 nights for business. Picked the hotel due to it being located on the north side of the city and was convenient to drive to/from Satui daily. There is also a small shopping centre across the road from the hotel. 

Hotel is comfortable, has foreign TV, AC is cool and the shower water is warm. However, it is fairly old and is in need of some maintenance. The gym is in a dingy little room which needs a window and good clean out. 

The biggest let down was the room service. Expect about an hour wait after ordering. This would be the only reason I wouldn't stay here again in the future.

reviews.text: I had my year end holiday in Samarinda.  I stayed at this hotel, based on the recommendation of my friend who lives in Samarinda.  I like Grand Victoria Hotel.  The location is strategic and close to a big mall of Lembuswana.  The room is standard, the food is good.  The view from the restaurant on roof top of 7th floor was great.  We also had the celebration of New year 2012 in that restaurant.  The service is friendly.  What I wanna say is this is a good 3 stars hotel in Samarinda, East Borneo - Indonesia.

FO tidak ramah, pesen kamar malah dikasih kamar org (pas buka kamar sudah ada org nya di dalam) parah bgt FO nya

reviews.text:
Ini adalah pertama kalinya saya menginap di Grand Victoria Hotel dengan klasifikasi Bintang Dua yang terletak di tengah kota.

Untuk penataan ruang kamar bagus, tempat tidur nyaman, fasilitas baik hanya saja kamar mandi yang mempergunakan bathtub ini perlu perawatan lebih baik.

Hotel yang dilengkapi juga dengan fasilitas Spa dan reflexiology ini menyediakan sarapan di roof top dengan standar menu sarapan yang baik dan terdiri dari aneka lauk Indonesia, fruits basket, cake, salad, bubur ayam, hingga omellete stahl. Salah satu unggulan dari tempat sarapan ini adalah pengunjung bisa menikmati pemandangan kota .

Area masuk lobby juga perlu mendapatkan perhatian, mengingat sebagai lokasi awal tamu masuk dimana saya masih melihat terdapat puntung rokok dan bekas gelas plastik di dekat pintu masuk.

Area parkir depan juga terlihat gersang serta banyak daun daun kering yang tidak dibersihkan secara baik.

Untuk pelayanan hotel crew patut mendapatkan jempol karena sangat ramah dan terlihat selalu ingin menyenangkan tamu. Hanya saja sedikit masukan buat team room boy apabila mengetuk atau memencet bell namun belum dibuka jangan berulang melakukan hal tersebut karena bisa saja tamu tersebut sedang menikmati tidur.

Semoga Grand Victoria kedepan lebih memperhatikan kebersihan Lobby, entrance area, publik toilet serta taman2 nya.
reviews.title: Sarapan dengan City View

reviews.text: Menginap bersama keluarga hotel ini bisa jadi pilihan, dengan harga standart dapet kamar yang lumayan luas. Pelayanan pada saat sarapan oke banget, makanan juga enak. Recommended untuk keluarga walaupun hotelnya quite old
reviews.title: Pelayanan oke banget

reviews.text: Pengalaman saya menginap disini, untuk Suite, tolong kebersihan pada sofa di tingkatkan lagi, karena ada bau tidak sedap pada sofa dan manajemen kabel dibelakang TV tidak enak dipandang & mohon juga saya pernah menginap untuk selimut, baunya sangat tidak enak, seperti belum kering tapi sudah dipasang. But dari segi lokasi sangat bagus, pelayanannya beberapa sangat ramah, dan makanannya enak. Last Untuk yang ingin menginap di akhir pekan, khususnya hari sabtu mohon minta kamar yang jauh dari sisi jalan raya, karena biasanya pada malam tsb di tengah malam banyak orang-orang / komunitas yang melakukan balapan liar, dan suaranya sangat mengganggu sekali.

reviews.text:
Wow this has been a surprise. Book my room from traveloka, arrived at the hotel by 5PM and my room was not ready, it took them 45 mins. And the shocking part was they told me there is no NON Smoking room. I am with small kids and baby. They are so pro to smoking so that all their room are all smoking type, not even a question of availability. Weirdest part was traveloka pick them to be partner hotel, and no alert on this all smoking room situation. 

I went to another "normal" hotel where they have non smoking room. I asked for cancellation and now being handled by Traveloka.
reviews.title: Bad Management & All smoking room!

reviews.text: Im not suggested this hotel for family and shopping in Samarinda. The view is poor because this hotel is in the middle of crowded. This is my second time to stay in this hotel, the first time I came the street its still in repairation, and then the second time I come the street is still in chaos

reviews.text: Taking into consideration the price, this simple hotel is not bad. But may be not suitable if you stay for a long period. The rooms are nice inside. I didn't try the food but I heard that local food is not bad too. The location is not the best in Samarinda
reviews.title: Good for short time

reviews.text: I am staying here by recommendation, the hotel facade doesn't look convincing, however, the quality of the room and services was on another level. The staffs was very helpful, when I first came, my room wasn't ready, since I have another appointment outside, I leave my belonging at the reception, and when I came back a few hours later, they already put my baggage inside my room, very attentive, I like it, but maybe not all of people agree with me and they prefer the bellboy to bring their baggage together with them. I am staying in Executive room, which is spacious and not expensive at all, overall, their room rates were affordable. My room was clean enough, even though there's a small hole in the sofa caused by cigarette, but it wasn't a problem for me. Breakfast was delicious and many variations, they changed daily. I have no time to go to the spa area, maybe for my next visit. They also provide free WiFi in the room and public area which is very useful for me. There's a mini market in the opposite of the hotel and a lot of Nasi Kuning stalls on the surrounding area at night. It was surprisingly nice hotel indeed.
reviews.title: Surprisingly nice hotel

reviews.text: At first I came, I was looking for a standard single (IDR 278.000) room. But unfortunately there's no available room for standard single, and they told me to go for standard double (IDR 318.000). The price shown already included the tax which is very affordable! The room is nice but the bathroom is quiet small, anyway I found a condom plastic in my room (which is bad). The staff is really helpful, they phoned me the next day and told me that the standard single room is now available and I can move, they're really glad to help bring my baggage. The breakfast is nice but so tasty, the executive chef come over me and asked whether the breakfast is good or not. I really impressed with the good standard of quality but not about the cleanness of the room. But for sure, I may come again next time! :)
reviews.title: Affordable Price with Good Service

Anyway, if you just need a decent room to rest, doesn't really bother with staff services.. This hotel woud be nice for you.

reviews.text:
Stayed here for 2 nights. Room was spacious and good. Standard amenities. Air conditioner worked well... the minus point was only weak wifi signal. It must be improved. 

The breakfast was average. Indonesian food, porridge, egg stations, cereals and fruit

This is also Islamic hotel, so you will hear some Islamic song played in the room hall way and also the sound of prayer call (adzan) can be heard clearly. 

It located in central Samarinda, near Samarendah Park.. street food only 5 minutes walk.

Good stay but I believe it need improvement

reviews.text: What amazing is the room was very large, it so spacious for the price rate. Fit if you have your family with children travelling with you. The name Syariah had guarantee that the visitor/costumer of the hotel are use for good cause. It have good cleanliness, amenities, mineral water (4 bottle 600 ml), praying sajadah-mukenah, quran. This hotel also located at center of Samarinda, near taman Samarendah, so so can do morning walk at this newly build park.

reviews.text: spent one night at this hotel .. good staffs.. large enough room.. good breakfast.. if u wanna pray al_qur'an,sajadah n tasbih complete at room.. but now there are renovation activity n a bit noisy at noon.. we get good enough service for the best room price.. wish can come here again soon

reviews.text: Stayed one night for a seminar. Close to the University of Mulawarman.  A simple and relatively cheap hotel. Good breakfast menu. Spacious room for the price, but little bit smelly, might be the old carpet.

reviews.text:
Stayed here for 2 nights as part of a work trip to Samarinda. There are not many hotel options in Samarinda. We typically stay in the Aston Samarinda, but a local event resulted in many of the hotels being fully booked. 

Pros :
(1) Clean Rooms
The rooms were clean. Which is the most basic requirement of any hotel. The d√©cor inside is a bit dated, but the rooms were clean that is all that really matters. Photos of the room are attached.

(2) Free Wi-Fi
Wi-Fi is free. The speed is also good enough for reading emails and general surfing. More than sufficient for getting your work done. They give you a Wi-Fi Coupon upon check-in. The coupon has the user-name/password on it and is good for logging-in for one device. If you have more than one device, just ask for another coupon. No fuss they will give you as many as you want. 

I got an additional 2 coupons and my counterparts took 2 more also

(3) Pleasant Staff
The staff at the hotel are very pleasant and very willing to help. Making for a pretty good level of service. But their language skill is a hurdle. More on that in next section.

Cons:
(1) Location
The hotel isn't located near the town centre or any amenities. So it is a bit troublesome to get to anywhere if you do not have a driver/vehicle at your disposal. Which was not a problem in our case, but can be inconvenient otherwise. Photos attached showing surrounding area of the hotel

(2) Hotel Geared Towards Local Clientele
Samarinda is a mining town and it does get it's fair share of visitors from overseas. However the Grand Sawit is more geared towards catering for a more local clientele. Many of the signs are in Bahasa only and many of the staff speak Bahasa only.

A rudimentary understanding of Bahasa is useful, which we had and that helped a lot. The staff are really pleasant and try their best. 

Was a pleasant stay all in all. Not sure if I would stay here again the next time I come into Samarinda for business. Much preferred the Aston Samarinda which we typically stay in.
reviews.title: Nothing Spectacular but A Decent Night Sleep

reviews.text:
This is my first time staying at this hotel, but my bosses they've been here once and they said this hotel isn't upgraded but downgraded.
The room has old interior and design, which is not a problem, it is also spacious, but it's bit dirty because I can spot dust. Worst thing happen in my boss's room, he said he found a dry blood spot on bed sheet. the ac is leaking, and the water keep dropping to the rug make it soggy. They used to have beers but not anymore.
And I don't like the option for non-buffet breakfast, means they deliver the food to my room with option only Fried Rice or Noodle. To get regular breakfast I have to pay 50,000 more, and they charge for 2 person because the room is for 2 persons even if it's just 1 person who stays. Fantastic!!

reviews.text: A potentially being great hotel with natural ambience. This is not my first time to stay at the hotel and I noticed room not properly cleaned with obvious stinks. reviews.text:
This hotel is nice for surroundings , but that where it all ends  . Between maintenance problems and poor service its sad to stay there. There is not one day when you are there that something does not go wrong . . It isn't worth it for the price.. Even the cheaper hotels in town are better....
 I have traveled extensively throughout Southeast Asia staying at all star hotels . This would be the worst by far
reviews.title: Double Standards and poor service

reviews.text:
We stayed in Mesra for 6 days last December 2016. The staff was courteous and very humble welcoming, there have been no issues with services of any kind, the facility was well maintained and rooms were regularly cleaned, we had an issue with water leakages in bathroom but the plumbing service was quick and had fixed it in no time. Breakfast served in Mesra i must say has very good variety of local and continental cuisines. 
The staff serves the meals with warmth and a welcoming smile. 
The view of the city from room's balcony was spectacular and was serene. The property is very green and the best part is the visitors are free to interact easily with guest and with sense of privacy. 
I would definitely recommend this resort to others, if there want to have great stay with wonderful memories.
reviews.title: PERFECT GETAWAY - VALUE FOR MONEY

reviews.text:
I will not be staying at this facility again.
My partner and I have travelled extensively throughout Southeast Asia staying at all star (1-5) rated facilities.
However, the Mesra with its 4star rating is by far one of the worst we have stayed.
You have to read fine print and/or look at images to know if your included breakfast is nothing more than an egg and tea or buffet.
Check-in process also not welcoming and then the room allocated very dated.
None of which was indicated on booking website.
All in all, not a hotel we will come back to.
reviews.title: Double Standards and Check Fine Print

reviews.title: cheap hotel with standard facilities

reviews.text:
Hotel ini sejak september 2019 sudah tidak bekerjasama dengan OYO lagi, tapi review nya hanya tersedia ini jadi saya review di sini ya.
Hotel ini memiliki review yang buruk, tadinya saya tidak berani tinggal lama, jadi pertama saya mencoba 2 malam 16-17 feb 2020 karena review dimana2 nilainya cukup jelek. Saya tinggal di kamar 8607 (lantai 6 kamar no 7), setelah 2 malam saya perpanjang sampai 5 malam (cek out tgl 21) karena tempat cukup baik dan sprei diganti untuk kasur yang digunakan (saya pilih ranjang twins dan satu tidak digunakan).
Untuk kamar, banyak yang mengatakan kamar kecil, yang disebut kecil itu antar kasur twin berdekatan (mungkin), jarak antar kasur sekitar 50cm, jarak dari kasur ke tv sekitar 2meter lebih. Untuk kamar mandi tersedia shampo dan sabun cair satu tempat penuh (kalau OYO menyediakan terbatas), ruang kamar mandi luas. Untuk air panas banyak yang mengatakan tidak ada, air panas ini harus ditunggu sekitar 2-3 setelah itu air pasti panas terus. Kamar tidak disediakan air kemasan (sepertinya seluruh hotel di Samarinda seperti itu karena kebijkan pemerintah mengurangi plastik), dan kompensasinya adalah disediakan air galon di lorong Hotel.
Sarapan pagi disediakan di lantai 2, jika tidak memesan kamar dengan sarapan, bisa menambah bayar 70ribu per orang (lebih baik beli makanan di luar jika tidak membeli kamar dengan sarapan).
Sekitar Hotel banyak tempat makan seperti Gudeg, Nasi Gandul, Ketoprak, Tektek, Pecel Ayam, Bakso dan Soto, Steak & Ice Cream, AYCE, dll.
Resepsionis nya banyak yang mengatakan sombong, judes, tidak ramah. Menurut yang saya lihat, pertama, memang kurang ramah jika anda tidak tinggal di sana dan hanya nanya harga - kedua, saat saya mau cek in yang jaga 2 wanita berkerudung (maap hanya ini ciri khasnya), kedua resepsionis ini sangat baik dan sangat ramah, selama 3 hari mereka jaga resepsionis selalu menyapa (walau anda tidak melihat ke arah resepsionis)- ketiga, resepsionis di hari keempat ganti, wanita yang lebih besar sedikit dari resepsionis sebelumnya, nah resepsionis ini berbeda sekali, memang tidak menyapa dan kurang enak wajah yang ditampilkan (kurang senyum), waktu cek out juga sama resepsionis ini, jadi kesan terakhir kurang enak.
Untuk cek in cek out memang sedikit lama, tapi diambil positifnya aja, mereka sedang menyediakan kamar yang baik buat kita.
Tersedia fasilitas kolam renang dan tempat santai di rooftop nya. Air kolam renang terpelihara dengan bersih.
reviews.title: Bukan OYO 1530 lagi

reviews.text:
Hotelnya agak tua. Lokasi ok krn di pusat kota. Tapi kebersihan kurang. Ada kecoa mati di pojok kamar, floor drain kamar mandi terbuka dan banyak rambut tersangkut. Kamar mandinya bau kecoa. Dan banyak debu dibelakang nakas tempat tidur.
Tv tidak bisa ditonton karena gambarnya goyang.
Untungnya kondisi kasur bagus, ac dingin, air panas berfungsi dan deras. Sabun dan shampoo yg disediakan kelewat encer, susah dipakai.
Kolam renang lokasinya oke di roof top, tapi di nat keramik dasar kolam banyak lumutnya. 
Menu sarapan standard, tapi service kurang ok. Jam 8 pagi saya datang banyak yg sudah habis karena sepertinya ada acara dihotel, tapi tidak diisi lagi seperti susu, roti. Saya minta susu sampai setengah jam tidak diisi karena katanya yg ambil belum datang.
Untuk harga yg ditawarkan jadi berasa kemahalan.
reviews.title: Hotel tua, kebersihan kurang

reviews.text:
Konsep hotel bernuansa pecinan ini masih perlu banyak sinkronisasi antara konsep dengan layanannya. Kamar hotel selayaknya rerata hotel budget, saya apresiasi kebersihannya yang baik (menginap di kamar superior). 
Khusus untuk layanan resto pada sarapan pagi, manajemen perlu lebih serius mengatur melakukan pembenahan layanan agar tata meja hidangan lebih ergonomis dan bebas semut.
Akses masuk lobby agar dibenahi dan diatur agar kendaraan tamu tidak menurunkan penumpang terlebih dahulu saat posisi masuk hotel, namun wajib memutar di halaman samping terlebih dahulu sehingga posisi menurunkan penumpang benar, yaitu mobil merapat ke sisi bangunan hotel di sisi kiri arah jalan keluar hotel dan membuka pintu mobil sebelah kiri. menghindari resiko tertabrak mobil tamu lain karena jalan akses cukup sempit.
reviews.title: tingkatkan layanan dan pengelolaan agar recommended.

reviews.text: I did not stay in JB hotel - this is why I do not rate it as horrible (since I do not know). None in the hotel staff was speaking even basic English, which could be ok if they were at least helpful, since simarinda is not a highly touristic place. But they are not. Actually I have traveled a lot in budget places and never had to face less helpful staff - or even people. I arrived around 20 or 21 and the hotel was full. I ask them to call other hotels whose numbers I had. They just ignored me. As I was standing in the hall waiting for them to make this phone call, after 10 minutes one guy just told me "all hotels full" without making any call. At 21, it is already dark for 3 hours. Samarinda is not safe at night. This hotel is not so close to other hotels. I let you do the maths...
reviews.title: Never met less helpful staff

reviews.text:
Nothing to write home about but it was relatively clean‚Ä¶ the bathroom could have been cleaner though. My two main problems were.

1. No wifi in the rooms. In this day and age that is inexcusable, especially when you consider how many mining clients must pass through here.

2. Rooms weren't mosquito proof. They flew in threw the bathroom vent.

Staff were polite and helpful and location was fairly close to the river and walking distance from food/markets and the mosque, without being so close that it was noisy.

reviews.text:
I travelled in whole Asia and slept in very cheap places - and never been to a place so unkempt: it is dirty, pieces of wrappings and cigarets buts in the room, on fourniture and in the shower, holes in the sheets, not speaking of the tableclothes in the breakfast room, so stained I think you can get serious digestion issues only by staring at them too long, etc. In addition,unwelcoming night staff and of course, do not expect hot water. 
As they only had a "deluxe room" left whereas I had booked a standard one, I went to a deluxe. I can't even imagine how their non "deluxe" rooms look like...
Hotels in Samarinda are quite expensive in comparaison with other places in Indonesia, but even for this price, you can have a much better place. The hotel just accross the street (new hayani) is more or less the same price and better.

reviews.text:
Hotel ini sepertinya sedang direnovasi dan sebagian sudah baik. Tetapi masih tersisa kamar-kamar yang kondisinya tidak nyaman.

Kekurangan:
- Saya kebagian kamar di bagian hotel yang sudah menua. Peeping hole sudah rusak dan hanya disumpal tisu/kertas. Begitu masuk tercium bau menyengat yang ternyata dari saluran pembuangan kamar mandi yang bermasalah. Sempat bolak balik pindah dari dan ke 2 kamar yang ternyata punya masalah yang sama karena kamar hotel yang lain katanya sudah penuh semua. Pada akhirnya harus pasrah di kamar yang untungnya lama-lama baunya berkurang meskipun masih sangat tidak nyaman.  
- Wifi tidak sampai ke kamar, dan kalaupun terdeteksi sinyalnya sangat lemah dan tidak cukup bagus untuk melakukan koneksi.
- Air panas keluar SANGAT lama. Sangat membuat boros air dan terlanjur kedinginan.
- Tidak ada socket listrik di dekat tempat tidur.

Nyaris tidak ada kelebihan yang saya rasakan saat menginap di hotel ini kecuali mungkin lokasinya yang dekat pusat kota. Sarapan standar saja. Untungnya pelayanan dari staff lumayan ramah meski dengan kondisi kemarin tidak ada bantuan yang berarti.

Kecuali semua kamar hotel sudah diperbaharui saya rasa agak kapok menginap di hotel ini lagi.

reviews.text:
Saya menginap bersama adik di sini. Saya memilih hotel ini karena selain harganya tidak mahal juga karena saya dengar di sini sering dipakai menginap para pemain sepakbola liga Indonesia. Saya bayangkan tempat ini pastilah cukup nyaman. Tapi setelah sampai di sana, semua bayangan saya menguap. Hotelnya kecil, tidak layak sebagai hotel berbintang, tidak ada fasilitas apapun selain kamar dan restoran.
Kamarnya tidak luas, kualitas perabotannya di bawah standar, kamar mandinya juga tidak tampak sebagai kelas hotel berbintang. Saat sarapan, menunya hampir tidak ada pilihan walaupun prasmanan. Ruang restorannya kecil di samping lobi. 
Saya tidak merekomendasikan hotel ini ke siapapun. Apalagi lokasinya berada di jalan yg terkesan kotor dan kumuh. Kota Samarinda sendiri bukan kota yg menarik. Banyak sudut kota yg terlihat kumuh dan tak terawat. Banjir di mana-mana, juga macet, panas, dan terlihat gersang. Semua itu menambah kesan buruk saya selama tinggal di sana.
reviews.title: Not recommended

reviews.text:
1 mlm nginep di mj dalam rangka dinas ke loajanan. Kamar deluxe tp fasilitasnya tdk seperti deluxe. Tdk ada tisu di kmr. Plafon dpn kmr mandi berjamur. Ruangan nya terlihat lama.
Tapi bell boy nya ramah...
reviews.title: Tidak terpelihara

reviews.text:
Awal November 2012 kemarin saya ada tugas di Samarinda.Ketika mencari di Internet ingin mencari hotel, dapat hotel MJ. Walaupun hanya semalam, saya mencoba mensharing kesan-kesan saya selama menginap di Hotel MJ.

(+): Secara keseluruhan bagus. Makanan bervariasi, pelayanan ramah, dan yang paling penting adalah hotel ini sangat dekat sekali dengan pusat kota Samarinda. Mungkin menurut saya hotel ini adalah yang terdekat ke Pasar Pagi, Kawasan Citra Niaga dll untuk mencari oleh-oleh atau sekadar berbelanja, sehingga ini merupakan nilai plus Hotel MJ dibandingkan hotel lain nya. 

Selain itu hotel ini juga dilalui oleh travel-travel (shuttle car) dari Bandara Sepinggan ke kota Samarinda seperti: Cipaganti, Kangaroo dan Prima (yang ini malah shuttle point nya ada di hotel).

(-): Yang harus ditingkatkan hanya kualitas interior kamar dan lift nya yang terlihat sudah menua termakan umur.

Konklusi: Lain waktu kalau ke Samarinda, prefer memilih hotel MJ kembali.
reviews.title: Semalam di MJ Samarinda

name: Capital O 949 Royal Park Hotel
address: Jl. Sentosa No. 1, Samarinda 75242 Indonesia

reviews.text:
Saya tinggal 3 malam, opsi di travel online tidak menyediakan sarapan, bisa tambah 35.000 nett, tapi saya tidak ambil.
Kamar Hotel pencahayaannya terang, tidak ada remang-remang. Ada beberapa penduduk tidak diundang, seperti beberapa anak kecoa. Kamar cukup luas. Untuk kamar mandi, pembuangan airnya sedikit lambat sehingga ada genangan. Di Hotel ini tidak tersedia air kemasan, jadi menggunakan botol beling untuk isi ulang (steril / tidak penilaian masing-masing).
Sekitar Hotel siang maupun malam ada tempat makan, seperti pecel ayam, soto sapi, bakso, fried chicken, nasi goreng tektek. Jadi pasti ga kelaparan.

Semoga membantu.
reviews.title: Hotel Pas

reviews.text: Hotelnya sangat bagus, tempat tidur bersih. Hanya sayang lantai kamar kotor. Wastafel sempat tersumbat airnya. Air panas tdk berfungsi. Ac dingin. Breakfast tidak berkesan baik varian dan tastenya. Pelayanan friendly.
reviews.title: Peningkatan pelayanan

reviews.text: Awalnya memesan kamar di hotel ini karena kami hanya bermalam selama satu malam saja di Samarinda. Kesan yang didapat dari hotel ini adalah hotel lumayan baru, kamar bersih dan rapi. Yang mengecewakan adalah sarapannya yang kurang bervariasi, cenderung biasa saja, dan kurang enak. Padahal, saat saya menginap adalah long weekend. Space restoran untuk sarapan pun kecil. Tidak cocok hotel ini mem-branding dirinya sebagai hotel bintang tiga. Saran saya, booking lah hotel bintang tiga lainnya di kota Samarinda. Dengan harga yang hampir sama, Anda mendapatkan yang lebih baik.

reviews.text: We met Dennis randomly walking around and he took us all over town meeting people and enjoying a day in the life at  kalimantan samarinda. We sat in on a lesson at the bottle school, learned about cassava farming, wove baskets for rice, and took in the sights and sounds of the town, all while enjoying local food and drink. Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Best Day in Indonesia

reviews.text:
A 2D/1N tour for two for Rp 4.5 miljon including "food & water". We agreed on an itinenary to visit some villages and do some boat tours around the Mahakam.

Day 1:
Pickup at the hotel to walk to the public bus which was overfull and had no space. After a 3/4 hour drive we went on a public kano to wait at his grandfathers house in the heat for a long time (this was "visiting a village"). Picked up by the kano to bring us to our very cheap and dirty guesthouse in an other village. At 15:30h picked up again by the kano and spend one hour at the river were we saw a glimpse of the dolphins. We got back and we had to search for a warung that was open to get some food. In the night it was hard to sleep because of the very loud mosque.

Day 2: 
We were asked if we wanted nasi kuning for breakfast which we didn't. There were no other options so we didn't have breakfast. We were supposed to leave. When I told him it was already past that time he said that my (automatic adjusting) time on the phone was wrong. The tour for that day changed into crossing the two lakes to the town where the bus to Samarinda was supposed to be.  We arrived at this place at 10:00 that's when we noticed the tour was practically over. There was no bus. He asked us to pay extra for a driver, we didn't want to. He took us to his house where we found out that he actually got money from parents and the church to run his bottle school. He did not drop us off, he let the driver solve this without paying him extra. The driver was quite mad at him. And we were a bit sad that the second tour day was so short.

During the whole tour he only talked Indonesian to my mother (which I don't understand) and expected my mother to translate this for me. In the few English conversations we had, he soon started to complain about religion and government before continuing in Indonesian again.

The question: "What kind of bird is that?" was answered by "A bird.."

Calculating real costs:
Bus max 140k
Kano for 1 day max 600k (we only used this for 1,5 hour)
Food for 3 max 100k
Homestay max 300k
Kano for 1 day max 600 k (We only used this for 1,5 hour)
Car back to Samarinda 300k

Total 2040k. But this is when you book the kano for two full days which we didn't.

At the end of the tour he said he was sorry if he had done something wrong and I gave him the feedback that the tour was quite sort that day (my mom already she didn't like a few things that were happening during the tour but he didn't do anything about this. 

This was a total rip off!
reviews.title: Got ripped off by Dennis

reviews.text:
Dennis is a local guide who offers tours where the main words are ‚Äúflexibility‚Äù and ‚Äútake it easy‚Äù. 

He can do jungle tours, one way tours to Derawan, or whatever you want around Samarinda. We did a tour up the Mahakam river, visiting villages. 

He is very proud of the local culture and nature. But when you do a tour with him (which I do recommend), be sure to manage the itinerary. We spent a fair bit of time waiting around (bring a book/game). This is not bad per se, but Dennis was not proactive in letting us know what was going on. Also he seemed not to listen to us at times. In short, you can have a great time really getting to know Kalimantan through local eyes, but keep in charge of the schedule. 

He picked us up from the bus station and dropped us there as well.

He also teaches local kids English in his self made school for free. You can volunteer to help teach or help with some construction projects. Dennis also teaches people about cleaning trash. 

For contact details, Google maps ‚ÄúDennis Laba Kelen guide‚Äù.
reviews.title: Authentic friendly local experience

reviews.text:
I was looking for a guide who could take me upriver and somehow stumbled upon this guy by the name of Dennis. I contacted him and we met. It turned out that Dennis was exactly the kind of guide I was looking for: he knows English quite well and as a local he is very good connected. And he understood what I was interested in.
He took me on a wild and rewarding ride for 6 days. We both were really tired afterwards. After the tour I was so exhausted that I actually needed a room in a hotel and couldn't stay the night at his place.

But be aware: before you start your trip you are "forced" to give some English lessons to kids from the neighbourhood. Dennis is not only a good guide but has a mission too.
He is constructing a house made totally out of empty plastic bottles. This house serves as a school where he teaches English to local kids. A matter of passion and dedication and his work needs to be supported. 

Book him as a guide, stay some nights at his home as a member of the family and help educate the kids. The educated kids will help to make Indonesia - and the world - a cleaner place.
reviews.title: A passionate man

owner_response.text: Thank you so much!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

reviews.text:
I stayed in Dennis' house for several days after having travelled with him along the Mahakam River. Dennis is an official tour guide and has been very flexible to adjust the trip to what I wanted to see and according to my budget. Even if normally I do not travel with tour guides, it was the best decision to go with Dennis and learn about the Dayak culture in Kalimantan. 
Dennis house is in the outsides of noisy Samarinda, he and his family are very friendly and food is provided 3 times per day. The room is simple with a beautiful balcony looking into the forests, shared bathroom and common room. Very recommendable for an authentic stay.
reviews.title: Amazing stay in Samarinda and trip to Mahakam River

reviews.text:
We met Dennis as we arrived at the bus station of Samarinda. 
Dennis is an official tourist guide. As we didn't know if we wanted to go up the Mahakam river with or without a guide, he proposed us to stay at his guesthouse, outside the noisy and expensive city center, and take the time to decide.
The guesthouse is on the opposite side of the river, in front of Samarinda city center (reachable using Ojek or 2 Angkot). It currently consists in a room on the first floor of his house. It is very simple (mattress on the floor), the bathroom is the mandi of the family (very clean). You can use the kitchen to cook your self. Tea and coffee is for free, rice is always available for free too. Sometimes we enjoyed the food prepared by Dennis or his wife, sometimes we bought some food to share with them.
For 100 000Rp per night, it is great value. 

Dennis has 4 children, so the house can get a bit noisy sometimes. 

We really liked being in what seemed to us a village at a few kilometers of the city, with everything you need (ATM, supermarkets) and sharing people's lives. We also visited the school where Dennis' kids go. 

Dennis is really helpful, whether you choose to go on a tour with him or not. And if you do choose to make the Mahakam tour with him, you will not regret it, as it is also sharing the local people's lives.

Thanks Dennis, we had wonderful moments with you, your family and your friends !!!
reviews.title: Great stay with Dennis's family outside the noisy Samarinda center

reviews.text: Nice place little bit far from the centre (but with perfect connection by angkot) with new furniture, clean rooms and so kind and well english speaking staff. Breakfast is served into rooms. Eating places nearby. We recommend this place!

reviews.text: This guest house located near from Port, Bus station and Mahakam Bridge so its a good location for all traveler who want to go to "Ulu Mahakam" or away from city such as go to Balikpapan. Price relatively cheap compared to other hotel with same facility (at Samarinda for sure). Guest house Remaja has facility like a hotel, with spring bed, breakfast serve to room, hot shower, LED TV with satellite channel, free wifi and room access card (such as 3star hotel) Guest house's staff are friendly, room are clean and it has variated breakfast.
reviews.title: Guest house or hotel?

reviews.text: I stay here for business purpose, this hotel provide best facility such as lcd television with international cable channel, cool airconditioner, shower with hot water, friendly and humble staff, and for the price it is cheaper than hotel but this place give me facility like a hotel.

Beberapa kali menginap di Guest House Remaja. Lokasi penginapan yang paling dekat dengan Big Mall, terminal, pelabuhan dan kawasan pergudangan. Kamar masih baru dan cukup bersih.
Cocok untuk keluarga dan bisnis, karena bagi pasangan yang bukan suami istri tidak diperbolehkan untuk menginap.
WiFi kadang agak lemot, tapi saya rasa hampir seluruh tempat di samarinda internetnya lambat :D
Feel like home karena staff yang ramah dan selalu menyapa.

Deket ke sungai mahakam klo malam sempatlah mampir ke pinggiran sungai sambil kongkow2 cukupa ramai disana apalgi lokasi pas di depan islamic center. So far so good... :)
